title: Lillard Game-Winner, Jokic’s Brilliance, Clippers vs. Nets | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Lillard Game-Winner, Jokic’s Brilliance, Clippers vs. Nets | WHAT’S BURNIN’ | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
On this weeks episode of WHAT’S BURNIN’, Matt and Stak bring you the latest NBA news and notes. The boys discuss a crazy week that saw Jimmy Butler's return, a Damian Lillard crazy game-winner, the new-look Rockets staying hot, and Nikola Jokic continuing his inferno start. Plus, they preview the week ahead, including the Clippers with 2 big games vs. the Nets and Celtics.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
